name: IT LURKS...
description:
Space Base Delta's communication systems have gone offline, we need you to go there and try to figure out what the hell is going on, we believe they have been in contact with another life form and fear the worst. If all procedures were followed there should 8 days worth of Mission Logs left somewhere on the base, good luck soldier (you're gonna need it)!

Controls:

  • WASD/Arrows/Controller Joystick - Movement
  • E/F/Controller (X/Square)/Controller (A/X) - Collect Mission Log
  • Shift/Right Trigger/Right Shoulder/Left Stick Press - Sprint
  • R/Start - Reset Monster Position (Shouldn't be needed but there incase)
